abstract: News Analysis; energy experts say Donald Trump's proposal to encourage aggressive expansion of domestic oil and gas production as means to better economic and fiscal health is at odds with reality; domestic energy production is at its highest point in 40 years, and global glut in oil market has led to plunging prices.

headline.print_headline: A Prime Challenge to Trump’s Energy Claims: Economic Reality
headline.main: A Challenge to Donald Trump’s Energy Claims: Economic Reality

snippet: Energy policy experts who followed Mr. Trump’s proposals said that while some hewed to G.O.P. orthodoxy, others appeared implausible and ill considered.
lead_paragraph: Energy policy experts who followed Mr. Trump’s proposals said that while some hewed to G.O.P. orthodoxy, others appeared implausible and ill considered.
